DOC.brief_summary: To review the outcome of patients with soft tissue sarcoma treated with chemotherapy from 2004 and 2005.
DOC.brief_title: Chart Review of Treatments Received by Patients Diagnosed With Soft Tissue Sarcoma
DOC.detailed_description: Chart review of patients with soft tissue sarcoma treated with chemotherapy from 2004 and 2005 to determine outcome
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with soft tissue sarcoma treated with chemotherapy form 2004 and 2005. Not Specified
